name: mdetcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4))

stmt.origin: ffvelrnda(c1, c2, c3, c4, wcel(c0, ccrg))
stmt.pretty: ffvelrnda(c1, c2, c3, c4, c0 ∈ CRing)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccrg), wf(c3, c2, c4))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccrg), wf(c3, c2, c4))

stmt.origin: mdetf(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c6)
stmt.pretty: mdetf(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c6)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccrg), wf(c3, c2, c4))
-| wceq(c3, co(c5, cmdat, c0))
-| wceq(c6, co(c5, cmat, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c6))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CRing →(c3 : c2 → c4))
⊣ c3 =(c5[maDet]c0)
⊣ c6 =(c5[Mat]c0)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c6)
⊣ c4 =(Base ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c4))
-| wceq(c3, co(c5, cmdat, c0))
-| wceq(c6, co(c5, cmat, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c6))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CRing ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c3 ` c1)∈ c4)
⊣ c3 =(c5[maDet]c0)
⊣ c6 =(c5[Mat]c0)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c6)
⊣ c4 =(Base ` c0)

comment: The determinant evaluates to an element of the base ring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Sep-2015.) (Revised by AV, 7-Feb-2019.)
